Reviews.Title: Nice little camera
Reviews.Author: pam
Reviews.Content: This is a nice small digital camera that takes sharp images and the software is easy to use. A great value for the price.

Reviews.Title: Polaroid CAA-300TC Cmos Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Polkie
Reviews.Content: An excellent camera with a convenent size to hold in your hand. Great pictures. I would purchase again. Fast shipper.

Reviews.Title: This is a toy, not a serious camera
Reviews.Author: Esam M. Al Eissa
Reviews.Content: This camera is more of a toy than a serious camera. The quality of pictures is bad. Any simple movement and you get a wavy finishing. The flash does not go on when you shoot, even manually. You have to turn it on or off continuosly with a button. I bought this as a present to our nanny, but after finding out the quality I was too embarassed to give it to her. I bought her another one while I gave this camera to my 5-year old to play with. He loved it! Although the new batteries ran out in a couple of hours.Don't throw away your money. Spend $60 more and get a decent camera.

ProductInfo.Features:
8MB built-in storage
Takes video Clips
Polaroid Pixel Technology
AAA Batteries
ProductInfo.Name: Polaroid CAA-300TC 3MP CMOS Digital Camera with 1.8-Inch LCD Display (Titanium)
